What am I interested in?

Some of my interests include: artificial intelligence, computer graphics, and operating systems. My interest in computer graphics and operating systems stems from trying to squeeze more performance out of my computer while playing games. My interest in AI first arose when I discovered AI image generation I found the primitive creations of the time to be strangely enchanting especially when engineering the prompts exacerbated the strange artifacts of images and exposed the AI's way of thinking.

What do I do in my free time?

When I'm not working I enjoy hiking, working out, playing video games and watching video essays on whatever niche topic I feel like learning about. I have been fortunate to travel quite a bit and I've found learning about different places and ways of life to be a very enriching experience. I also enjoy designing and 3d printing things.
